channel.title: Comments on: Why Bend’s Tech Community Rallied Behind the Upcoming Bend Livability Conference

item.title: By: David N. Welton
item.dc:creator: David N. Welton
item.description:
If people find the subject interesting, there are some good sites/communities that deal with how to make a town work, and be affordable for everyone:
http://www.strongtowns.org/
http://marketurbanism.com/
